commentBody:
Eddie D's 49ers were a team this city was truly proud of, they really were astonishingly great; and I think it's fair to say that most of them were gentlemen.

The Santa Clara 49ers are a wan shadow of that long ago team with the same name. I wish them well, but I don't bother to watch them.

Mr. DeBartolo, I hope you get some great news later today, you do deserve it.
